Package org.helianto.core

Core domain model.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AddressableEntity Domain object to extend Entity with address information.
Agent Persist a relationship to an Agent, like a sales representative.
Bank Persist a relationship to a bank
Contact Persist a contact.
Credential Persist a credential, unique by principal.
Customer Persist a relationship to a customer
Division Persist a relationship to a division.
Entity Domain object to represent different business units.
HumanResource A class to persist Resources.
Individual Domain object to extend AddressableEntity as an individual
InternalEnumerator A class to hold last value for internal number lists.
Locale A domain object to hold support information for languages and countries.
Organization Domain object to extend AddressableEntity as an organization.
Owner A class to persist an owner, unique by key.
Partner Persist relationships between the organization and its partners, like customers, suppliers, banks, etc.
PersonalData Persist personal data.
Role Persist roles.
Service Persist services.
Supervisor A domain object to represent a supervisor, unique by a short name.
Supplier Persist a relationship to a supplier
User Persist the user account.
 

Enum Summary
Appellation An enumeration to supply int types for PersonalData.appellation.
CredentialState An enumeration to supply char types for Credential.credentialState.
CredentialType An enumeration to supply char types for Credential.credentialType.
Gender An enumeration to supply char types for PersonalData.gender.
LocaleType An enumeration to supply char types for Locale.localeType.
Notification An enumeration to supply char types for Credential.notification.
PartnerState Enumeration to represent a state for a Partner.
UserType Enumeration to represent a type for an User.
 

Package org.helianto.core Description

Core domain model.
